content: available in 3 sizes this fun project is for dog lovers everywhere begin with red heart super saver and choose from 3 sizes worked flat this beginner pattern will teach you how to do double_crochet clusters and granny stitch techniques matching bandanas is a fun way to share with your best friend so explore all the available colors to find your best match red heart® super saver® solids 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 - print multis & heathers 5 oz /141 g 236 yds/215 m small dog large dog human 1 1 1 ball measurement size 1 small dog approximately 8 20 5 cm wide size 2 large dog approximately 12 30 5 cm wide size 3 human approximately 18 45 5 cm wide
